title: Minimalist Silver Ring
description: This sleek silver ring embodies modern elegance with its clean lines and polished finish. Crafted from sterling silver, it features a comfortable band width perfect for everyday wear.
care_details: Clean with soft cloth, avoid harsh chemicals, store separately

title: Sculptural Gold Ring
description: A contemporary gold ring with an organic, sculptural form that catches light beautifully. Each piece is unique with subtle textural variations.
material_details: 18k yellow gold, matte finish with polished highlights
care_details: Professional cleaning recommended, avoid contact with perfumes
deliver_details: Custom made to size, 3-4 weeks delivery

title: Amber Trip Necklace
description: A striking necklace featuring carefully selected amber stones in graduated sizes. The warm honey tones create a captivating play of light and color.
material_details: Baltic amber, sterling silver chain and findings
care_details: Avoid water and direct sunlight, store in soft pouch

title: Mixed Metal Pendant
description: An innovative pendant combining contrasting metals in a harmonious design. The tension between materials creates visual interest and modern appeal.
material_details: Sterling silver and copper, oxidized finish
care_details: Clean copper areas with lemon juice, silver with polishing cloth

title: Organic Gold Earrings
description: Delicate gold earrings inspired by natural forms. The flowing lines and organic shapes create movement that complements the wearer's natural beauty.
care_details: Store in individual pouches, clean with jewelry cloth

title: Asymmetric Silver Earrings
description: Bold statement earrings featuring asymmetric design elements. Each ear displays a different but complementary form, creating dynamic visual balance.

title: Textured Silver Bracelet
description: A substantial silver bracelet with rich surface textures created through traditional metalworking techniques. The interplay of light and shadow adds depth and character.
care_details: Clean with soft brush and mild soap, dry thoroughly

title: Natural Stone Bracelet
description: An elegant bracelet featuring carefully selected natural stones set in a minimal metal framework. Each stone is unique in pattern and color variation.
care_details: Avoid water, clean stones with dry cloth only
